text: Yinghuo-1 was a Chinese spacecraft. People planned for it to be China's first interplanetary mission. Yinghuo-1 was supposed to orbit and study the planet Mars. It was launched with the Russian spacecraft Phobos-Grunt. The spacecraft got into space, but something went wrong and it could not escape earth's gravity. The name Yinghuo means firefly in Chinese. == References == Category:Chinese spacecraft Category:Mars
title: Yinghuo-1
